channel.title: Making lummy castle stairs work - Delta source
channel.description:
Ive done it so that when you click the ones at bottom work so you go up, Then ive done level to so that they go down, I wanna add option where they can choose up or down.
Anyone got one a code in there source what they can give me please or if you know how to do it post below. Thanks.
